Notes: Switch input to CD channel
Turn ON receiver and select CD as input channel
Switch input to TAPE channel
Turn ON receiver and select TAPE as input channel
Switch input to DVD channel
Turn ON receiver and select DVD as input channel
Switch input to DOCK channel
Turn ON receiver and select DOCK as input channel
Set dimmer brightness to highest level
Set dimmer brightness to mid level
Set dimmer brightness to lowest level
Set dimmer brightness to highest level
Set dimmer brightness to lowest level
Turn OFF(set into standby) receiver
Some kind of test modes. Leave test mode is possible by code 0x420 (Turn Off). Test modes provides clear of receiver setting.
Switch to FB
Tune next radio station when radio is selected.
Tune previous radio station when radio is selected.
Switch between Stereo and Mono when FM radio is selected.
Jump to next stored radio station when radio is selected.
Jump to previous stored radio station when radio is selected.
Volume Up (only when input is set to Video 3)
Volume Down (only when input is set to Video 3)
Mute (only when input is set to Video 3)
